The phone runs on the Android 12 operating system and is powered by the Mediatek MT6762G Helio G25 chipset. It has an octa-core CPU with four 2.0 GHz Cortex-A53 cores and four 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 cores, as well as a PowerVR GE8320 GPU. The main camera on the phone is a triple setup that includes a 13 MP wide lens, a 2 MP macro lens, and a 2 MP depth sensor. The phone also has a 5 MP selfie camera. It has a USB Type-C port for charging and supports USB Power Delivery 3.0. The phone is available in two colors: Grey Sand and Deep Blue Sea. It has a 5000 mAh non-removable battery and comes with 3GB of RAM.

generated.out: The iPhone 15 Plus is a sleek and powerful smartphone from Apple. It features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with a resolution of 1290x2796 pixels and a pixel density of 460 ppi. The device is powered by the Apple A16 Bionic chip and comes with 6GB of RAM. The main camera setup includes a 48MP wide lens and a 12MP ultra-wide lens, while the selfie camera features a 12MP wide lens. The device supports 4K video recording at 24/25/30/60fps, 1080p video recording at 25/30/60/120/240fps, and HDR. The iPhone 15 Plus also features Face ID, an accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass sensors, as well as Ultra Wideband 2 (UWB) support. The device runs on iOS 17 and has a battery capacity of 4383mAh, which supports wireless charging via MagSafe and Qi. The iPhone 15 Plus is available in Black, Blue, Green, Yellow, and Pink colors and has models A3094, A2847, A3093, A3096, and iPhone15,5. The device has a SAR rating of 1.01 W/kg (head) and 1.12 W/kg (body), and a SAR EU rating of 0.98 W/kg (head) and 0.98 W/kg (body). The iPhone 15 Plus is priced at €1,059.00 / $929.99 / £879.00 / ₹89,900.

It comes with 32GB or 64GB of internal storage and 3GB of RAM. The LeEco Le 2 also features a fingerprint sensor on the back, as well as accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass sensors. It has a 3000mAh non-removable battery that supports 18W wired charging and QC2 fast charging, providing up to 50% charge in just 30 minutes. The device is available in Rose gold, gold, silver, and grey colors and was priced at around 190 EUR at the time of its release.
